title: Counseling Skills and Professional Competency Development: Utilizing Observational Learning and Expert Demonstrations

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of fundamental interpersonal and communication skills
context.additional_context: Conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, focusing on counseling skills applicable to real-world tasks for learner-managers/leaders

learning_goals: Learners can describe the five stages of counseling processes (relationship building, problem understanding, goal setting, intervention, evaluation) by observing expert video demonstrations (EVD)
Learners can practice applying three or more counseling skills acquired through observational learning in role-playing scenarios
Learners can demonstrate counseling skill application by submitting project-based assignments (virtual case counseling reports) incorporating peer feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
